concept.title: Edit OLE Objects in Drawings
concept.shortdesc: You can modify an embedded or linked object in its original programfromwithin ZWCAD. When you modify an embedded object, you change the object only in ZWCAD, not its original file (if you pasted the object from an existing file). When you modify a linked file, however, you open and change the original file.

conbody.p: Double-click the OLE object to start server applications in which you can edit the OLEobjects. ZWCAD provides two ways to edit OLE objects: one is to link or embed OLE objects which are supportive of other applications into ZWCAD drawings, or you can embed ZWCAD drawings into other applications.
